scim.title: SCIM
scim.description: Manage Fleet users with your identity provider

hostStatusWebhook.title: Host status webhook
hostStatusWebhook.description: Send notifications when hosts change status

changeEmail.confirmPassword: To update your email you must confirm your password.

changePasswordForm.passwordRequirements: Must include 12 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)

userSettings.smtpRequired: Editing your email address requires that SMTP or SES is configured in order to send a validation email. Users with Admin role can configure SMTP in **Settings > Organization settings**.

validation.confirmPasswordRequired: New password confirmation must be present
validation.passwordMismatch: New password confirmation does not match new password
validation.nameRequired: Full name field must be completed

ticketDestinations.title: Ticket destinations
ticketDestinations.description: Add or edit integrations to create tickets when Fleet detects new vulnerabilities.
ticketDestinations.validationFailed: There was a problem with the information you provided.
ticketDestinations.badRequest: Invalid login credentials or URL. Please correct and try again.
ticketDestinations.unknownError: We experienced an error when attempting to connect. Please try again later.
ticketDestinations.addErrorExists: Could not add {{integration}}. This integration already exists
ticketDestinations.addError: Could not add {{integration}}. Please try again.
ticketDestinations.deleteError: Could not delete {{integration}}. Please try again.

emptyTable.info: Add integrations to create tickets when Fleet detects new vulnerabilities.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: To help your end users connect to Wi-Fi or VPNs, you can add your certificate authority.

roleTooltips.gitops: The GitOps role is only available on the command-line when creating an API-only user. This user has no access to the UI.
roleTooltips.observerPlus: Users with the Observer+ role have access to all of the same functions as an Observer, with the added ability to run any live query against all hosts.

deleteUser.title: Delete user
deleteUser.message: You are about to delete {{name}} from Fleet.

emptyTable.info: Create a team to organize your hosts.

teams.sandboxMessage: Teams is only available in Fleet premium.

createTeam.title: Create team
createTeam.infoBanner: To organize your hosts, create a team, like "Workstations," "Servers," or "Servers (canary)".

deleteTeam.title: Delete team
deleteTeam.message: You are about to delete {{name}} from Fleet.
deleteTeam.warning: Users on this team who are not assigned to other teams will lose access to Fleet.
